general_requirements.statewide_program_name: Electrical permits required. Building permits required in cities like Sioux Falls and Rapid City. No special solar contractor license but electrical contractor license required.

interconnection.net_metering_details: Net metering available through rural electric cooperatives and municipal utilities.

special_considerations.wind_load_requirements: High wind area. Design wind speeds 100-115 mph.

licensing.license_type: Electrical contractor license required for all electrical work.

notes: Very low solar adoption. Limited state-level incentives. Growing interest in solar with new installations increasing.
